text:
Martin Klebba is an American actor with dwarfism.
Early life.
Klebba was born and grew up in Troy, Michigan on June 23, 1969, graduating from Athens High School.
Personal life.
, he was engaged to Michelle Dilgard, mentioning in an interview that in his free time, he likes to play video games with his son when he visits and spend time with his fiancée. Martin is the father of son Alec and daughter Makenzie.
Philanthropy.
Klebba runs a nonprofit foundation called Coalition for Dwarf Advocacy, which gives 100% of its donations to the cause of helping little people.
Politics.
Klebba is a supporter of Donald Trump and has been since his 2016 campaign.
